title: ID Typeface from Goddard film, 'Weekend', please?
content:
Hello typophiles,

Can anyone help me ID the typeface using in Goddard’s film ’Weekend’? It might have been created just for the film, but I thought I’d ask anyway. Thanks for any help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119073301im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/P1020184_4630.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119073301im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/PDVD_000_5726.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119073301im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/protectedimage_6010.jpeg)

 [‹ Friendly Typeface Recommendations](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119073301/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46599 "Go to previous forum topic") [Could you help me to discover the name of this types? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119073301/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46515 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Yableka

comments.content: Antique Olive with a custom tittle.
